title: MAG 045 - Blood Bag - Transcript
text:
dicate this area of study appealed to him. And why stay after everything 
that happened with Prentiss? Is it just loyalty or could it be something – 
[The office door opens.] 
MARTIN 
Hey, I just wanted to check if you wanted a cup of tea? 
ARCHIVIST 
Uh… 
MARTIN 
Oh, oh, sorry, are you recording? I, I thought you were done for the day? 
ARCHIVIST 
I-I was. I am. It’s… 
MARTIN 
Why do you have pictures of Tim? 
ARCHIVIST 
It… it’s a performance review thing, going over some files for it. 
MARTIN 
But that looks like a picture of his house? 
[Something rustles] 
ARCHIVIST 
Confidential files that you… legally you shouldn’t really be looking at them. 
Please, er, please leave, Martin. 
MARTIN 

The Magnus Archives – MAG045 – Blood Bag 
10 
 
Right, right. Right, right… Did you want that tea? 
ARCHIVIST 
No. Thank you, Martin. 
[Matin leaves. The office door closes.] 
I need to find a better place to do these recordings. 
End supplemental. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro]
